item.title: [MAHOUT-1017] clusterControlDataWithCanopy, clusterControlDataWithFuzzyKMeans, clusterControlDataWithDirichle examples are looking for output in the wrong place

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Cant you fix the bug by not adding final to the name ?
No, the -final suffix has been in trunk for some time and either the synthetic control code never got tested or it was reverted somehow. The patch is correct. I will commit the fixes.

All the Synthetic Control examples were broken for one reason or another. The Synthetic Control example code clearly never got tested after the -final change or after the ClusterWritable refactoring. Testing a patch for both now.
I think this issue is serious enough to assign to 0.7

Integrated in Mahout-Quality #1543 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/Mahout-Quality/1543/)
MAHOUT-1017:

  • improved logging message in FuzzyKMeansDriver
  • converted meanshift InputDriver and InputMapper to emit ClusterWritables used by other jobs
  • fixed synthetic control jobs to properly handle the -final suffix on final clusters-i directory
  • all synthetic control jobs run
  • all unit tests pass (Revision 1349015)

Result = SUCCESS
